name: Critical Sniper Counter Shoot
description: Shooting a  enemies at  level or take out the single high-profile target thanks to your sniper rifle. Since Sniper is a first person shooter, that is FPS, you will feel as a sniper killer. Look around you sharply, zoom in or out if necessary a seeing an enemy, pull the trigger by tapping on 'shoot' button. You are given different gun, weapon,rifle at each level so that you can test your aim and shooting skills on various guns.
